mapper.select: SELECT O.oIndex, B.pIndex, O.fin_co_no, B.kor_co_nm, B.fin_prdt_nm, B.join_way, O.lend_rate_min FROM home_loan_option O INNER JOIN home_loan_base B ON B.pIndex = O.pIndex WHERE O.oIndex IN (SELECT max(oIndex) from home_loan_option GROUP BY pIndex) ORDER BY O.lend_rate_min

SELECT O.oIndex, B.pIndex, O.fin_co_no, B.kor_co_nm, B.fin_prdt_nm, B.join_way, O.lend_rate_min FROM home_loan_option O INNER JOIN home_loan_base B ON B.pIndex = O.pIndex
AND
B.join_way LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{list_join_way},'%')
AND
O.mrtg_type_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{list_mrtg_type},'%')
AND
O.rpay_type_nm LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{list_rpay_type},'%')
AND
O.lend_rate_type_nm LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{list_lend_type},'%')
WHERE O.oIndex IN (SELECT max(oIndex) from home_loan_option GROUP BY pIndex) ORDER BY O.lend_rate_min

SELECT B.pIndex, B.fin_co_no, B.kor_co_nm, B.fin_prdt_cd, B.fin_prdt_nm, B.join_way, B.loan_lmt, O.rpay_type_nm, O.lend_rate_type_nm, O.lend_rate_min FROM charter_loan_option O INNER JOIN charter_loan_base B ON B.fin_prdt_cd = O.fin_prdt_cd GROUP BY B.fin_prdt_cd

SELECT B.pIndex, B.fin_co_no, B.kor_co_nm, B.fin_prdt_cd, B.fin_prdt_nm, B.join_way, B.crdt_prdt_type, B.crdt_prdt_type_nm, O.crdt_grad_avg FROM personal_loan_option O INNER JOIN personal_loan_base B ON B.fin_prdt_cd = O.fin_prdt_cd GROUP BY B.fin_prdt_cd

SELECT B.pIndex, B.fin_co_no, B.kor_co_nm, B.fin_prdt_cd, B.fin_prdt_nm, B.join_way, B.crdt_prdt_type, B.crdt_prdt_type_nm, O.crdt_grad_avg FROM personal_loan_option O INNER JOIN personal_loan_base B ON B.fin_prdt_cd = O.fin_prdt_cd
